landing.intro: Skalar Light is your introduction to the use of QR codes in your tickets.
landing.kombination: In combination with the Skalar Mobile Validator, you can easily create and devalue tickets.
landing.freeAndBest: The Skalar network offers you all the features you need to easily get started with your tickets and the best:
landing.completeFree: Skalar Light and Skalar Mobile Validator are completely free!
landing.nextLevel: You can also take your event to the next level with Skalar, our solution for ticket sales over the Internet. Skalar is the application that started our system and offers you and your guests our most complete experience.
landing.button.prepare: Prepare data for the Mobile Validator.
landing.button.inform: Find out more about Skalar here!
prepare.selectColumns: Select which data should be displayed during devaluation (maximum 7).
prepare.star: * maximum 7; The selection order is the order of the display (see Preview).
prepare.doubleStar: ** Preview similar; actual presentation may vary.
auth.skalarLightInfo: Log in to create new tickets.
auth.skalarLightInfo2: Sign up to start creating tickets.
err.authserviceunavailable: The authentication servers are currently unavailable. Please try again later.
err.malformedrequest: The authentication request contains an error. Please try again later.
err.emailInUse: The provided email is already in use. Please use another one.
err.regserviceunavailable: The register servers are currently unavailable. Please try again later.
err.passwordtooweak: The password does not meet the minimum requirements.
err.nomail: The provided email does not seem to be an actual email.
upload.drag: Pull a .csv file in the field or click to open the file selection.
